description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the Windows Mobile Broadband Driver Denial of Service vulnerability (CVE-2024-43561):

1. Review the build numbers to confirm compatibility with your system.
2. Download and apply the necessary updates corresponding to your Windows version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2 for x64-based Systems, use KB5044284: [Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems, use KB5044285: [Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems, use KB5044273: [Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
3. Restart your system to apply the updates.

**Details**:
This update addresses a denial of service vulnerability due to improper input validation and out-of-bounds read issues within the driver. Ensure your system is fully backed up before applying any updates to avoid data loss.

**Preconditions**:
- The system must match the specified build numbers for successful installation of the patches.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installations.
